content.question: Two capacitors and two batteries are connected in the circuit shown in the diagram above. The potential difference across <math alttext="C 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>C</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> is <math alttext="3 volts" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mn>3</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>V</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> . What is the potential difference across <math alttext="C 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>C</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
